# Valuation Intelligence Module - 10-Week Implementation Roadmap

**Module:** Valuation Intelligence  
**Timeline:** 10 weeks  
**Team Size:** 4 developers  
**Features:** 5 core features (A-E)

---

## Overview

This roadmap delivers the complete Valuation Intelligence Module with all 5 features, progressing from foundational valuation calculations to advanced AI-powered roadmap guidance.

---

## Week-by-Week Breakdown

### **Weeks 1-2: Feature A - Real-time Valuation Engine**
*Foundation: Core valuation calculations and Matador tier multipliers*

**Week 1:**
- Database schema for valuation snapshots and calculations
- TTM SDE/EBITDA calculation engine
- Matador tier multiplier logic (3×, 4.5-5×, 7×+)
- Basic API endpoints for valuation data

**Week 2:**
- Value delta calculations and trending
- Real-time data sync with Books OS
- Frontend valuation dashboard
- Unit tests and validation rules

**Deliverables:**
- [ ] Valuation calculation engine
- [ ] Real-time dashboard showing current valuation
- [ ] Matador tier classification system
- [ ] Value delta tracking

---

### **Weeks 3-4: Feature B - Value Driver Scoring Engine**
*Intelligence: 6-factor Matador-style scoring system*

**Week 3:**
- Driver scoring database schema
- Scoring algorithms for 6 drivers:
  - Management Independence
  - Financial Records Quality
  - Recurring Revenue
  - Operational Systems
  - Customer Base Diversity
  - Market Outlook

**Week 4:**
- Automated data collection from Books OS/QBO
- Driver score visualization and trending
- Score impact on valuation multiples
- Human-in-loop review for score changes

**Deliverables:**
- [ ] 6-factor scoring system
- [ ] Automated score calculation
- [ ] Driver impact on valuation multiples
- [ ] Score trending and alerts

---

### **Weeks 5-6: Feature C - Scenario Simulator**
*Planning: What-if modeling without Excel*

**Week 5:**
- Scenario modeling database design
- Adjustable lever system:
  - Recurring revenue changes
  - Owner hours reduction
  - Crew productivity improvements
  - Gross margin optimization

**Week 6:**
- EBITDA/SDE uplift calculations
- Multiple uplift modeling
- Interactive scenario builder UI
- Scenario comparison tools

**Deliverables:**
- [ ] Interactive scenario modeling
- [ ] EBITDA/SDE uplift calculations
- [ ] Multiple uplift projections
- [ ] Scenario comparison dashboard

---

### **Weeks 7-8: Feature D - Exit Readiness & Deal Room Builder**
*Preparation: Due diligence automation*

**Week 7:**
- Due diligence checklist engine
- Document collection automation
- Financial statement packaging
- KPI dashboard for buyers

**Week 8:**
- CIM (Confidential Information Memorandum) outline generator
- Deal room document organization
- AR/AP aging reports
- Tax return compilation

**Deliverables:**
- [ ] Automated due diligence checklist
- [ ] Deal room document assembly
- [ ] CIM outline generation
- [ ] Buyer-ready financial packages

---

### **Weeks 9-10: Feature E - Valuation Roadmap Agent**
*Guidance: AI-powered improvement recommendations*

**Week 9:**
- AI agent framework setup
- Weekly task generation system
- Operational improvement recommendations
- Financial optimization suggestions

**Week 10:**
- Task prioritization algorithms
- Progress tracking and measurement
- Integration with existing workflows
- Performance impact modeling

**Deliverables:**
- [ ] AI-powered roadmap agent
- [ ] Weekly operational tasks
- [ ] Financial improvement recommendations
- [ ] Progress tracking system

---

## Team Structure & Responsibilities

### **Backend Developer (Lead)**
- Database schema design
- Core calculation engines
- API development
- Data integration with Books OS/QBO

### **Frontend Developer**
- Dashboard and visualization components
- Interactive scenario builder
- Mobile-responsive design
- User experience optimization

### **AI/ML Developer**
- Driver scoring algorithms
- Roadmap agent development
- Predictive modeling
- Confidence scoring systems

### **DevOps/QA Engineer**
- CI/CD pipeline setup
- Testing automation
- Performance monitoring
- Security compliance

---

## Key Dependencies

### **Data Sources**
- Books OS (primary financial data)
- QuickBooks Online integration
- Industry benchmark data
- Matador tier definitions

### **Technical Dependencies**
- PostgreSQL database
- Redis for caching
- Background job processing
- AI/ML model serving

### **Business Dependencies**
- Matador tier multiplier validation
- Industry benchmark accuracy
- Due diligence checklist completeness
- Regulatory compliance requirements

---

## Risk Mitigation Strategies

### **Technical Risks**
- **Data Quality:** Implement validation rules and confidence scoring
- **Performance:** Use caching and background processing for complex calculations
- **Integration:** Build robust error handling for external data sources

### **Business Risks**
- **Accuracy:** Human-in-loop review for high-impact calculations
- **Compliance:** Regular audit of valuation methodologies
- **User Adoption:** Progressive feature rollout with training materials

---

## Success Metrics

### **Technical KPIs**
- Valuation calculation accuracy: >95%
- Dashboard load time: <2 seconds
- API response time: <500ms
- System uptime: >99.5%

### **Business KPIs**
- User engagement with valuation tools: >80%
- Scenario modeling usage: >60%
- Deal room preparation time reduction: >50%
- Valuation improvement tracking: 100% of active users

This roadmap delivers a comprehensive valuation intelligence platform that transforms how roofing contractors understand and improve their business value, progressing from basic calculations to AI-powered strategic guidance.
